definition: to express thanks
to fit/balanced/suitable
to weigh/to state/to name/name/appellation/to praise
variant of 秤[cheng4]/steelyard
surname Xie
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline

sentences.english: I will give you thanks, for you answered me; you have become my salvation.
sentences.chinese: 我要稱謝你，因爲你已經應允我，又成了我的拯救。

sentences.english: 5 who by his understanding made the heavens, His love endures forever.
sentences.chinese: 稱謝那用智慧造天的，因他的慈愛永遠長存。

sentences.english: Rejoice in the LORD, ye righteous; and give thanks at the remembrance of his holiness.
sentences.chinese: 你們義人當靠耶和華歡喜，稱謝他可記念的聖名。

sentences.english: Give thanks to the God of heaven. His love endures forever.
sentences.chinese: 你們要稱謝天上的神，因他的慈愛永遠長存。

sentences.english: Praise the LORD with harp: sing unto him with the psaltery and an instrument of ten strings.
sentences.chinese: 你們應當彈琴稱謝耶和華，用十弦瑟歌頌他。

sentences.english: I will praise you, O Lord , among the nations; I will sing of you among the peoples.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華阿，我要在萬民中稱謝你，在列邦中歌頌你。

sentences.english: 13 to him who divided the Red Sea asunder His love endures forever.
sentences.chinese: 稱謝那分裂紅海的，因他的慈愛永遠長存。

sentences.english: O give thanks unto the God of heaven: for his mercy endureth for ever.
sentences.chinese: 你們要稱謝天上的神，因他的慈愛永遠長存。

sentences.english: To him that stretched out the earth above the waters: for his mercy endureth for ever.
sentences.chinese: 稱謝那鋪地在水以上的，因他的慈愛永遠長存。

sentences.english: 7 who made the great lights- His love endures forever.
sentences.chinese: 稱謝那造成大光的，因他的慈愛永遠長存。

sentences.english: To him which divided the Red sea into parts: for his mercy endureth for ever
sentences.chinese: 稱謝那分裂紅海的，因他的慈愛永遠長存。

sentences.english: O give thanks unto the God of gods: for his mercy endureth for ever.
sentences.chinese: 你們要稱謝萬神之神，因他的慈愛永遠長存。

sentences.english: I will praise you with an upright heart as I learn your righteous laws.
sentences.chinese: 我學了你公義的判語，就要以正直的心稱謝你。

sentences.english: O Lord my God, I will give you thanks forever.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華我的神阿，我要稱謝你，直到永遠。

sentences.english: To him that by wisdom made the heavens: for his mercy endureth for ever.
sentences.chinese: 稱謝那用智慧造天的，因他的慈愛永遠長存。

sentences.english: Therefore will I give thanks unto thee, O LORD, among the heathen, and sing praises unto thy name.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華阿，因此我要在外邦中稱謝你，歌頌你的名。

definition: to refute/to demolish (an argument, theory etc)
to bow before (idiom)/to capitulate
hiding place/hideout
out of ammunition and no food left (idiom); in desperate straits
to whisper to one another's ear
to meet on the battlefield (idiom)
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
to obstruct/to impede
lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
38th parallel, forming the DMZ border between North and South Korea
to take the blame for sb else/to compensate for one's crime/to get charges dropped (by paying money etc)
(jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
obscene language
the last of the three entry-level exams in the imperial examination system of Ming and Qing dynasties
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
to undress
